exordian_avenger:curlup.NAME: Curlup
exordian_avenger:curlup.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! plated armor.

exordian_avenger:countercard.NAME: Counter
exordian_avenger:countercard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains Strength, deal damage equal to !M! times the strength it gained to the enemy.

exordian_avenger:defend.NAME: Perfectionism
exordian_avenger:defend.DESCRIPTION: Loose !M! hp. NL Gain !B! Block. At the end of combat heal!M! hp.

exordian_avenger:silencecard.NAME: Silence
exordian_avenger:silencecard.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Silence. Apply 1 Silence to yourself.
